alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 1:27PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Saline and central Pulaski Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 127 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Salem in Saline County, or near Bryant, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Benton... Sherwood... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Bryant... Downtown Little Rock... North Little Rock Airport... Southwest Little Rock... Haskell... Shannon Hills... Wrightsville... Argenta... Otter Creek... Gravel Ridge... Ironton... East End... Protho Junction... Lakewood... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near are lakes, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
